jathiya goda nagime amathi es. em. chandrasena mahatha pawasiya.kahatagasdigiliya pa්radeshiya sabhapathi gamini jayasekara mahathage meheyawima matha 2007 wasara athulatha sanwardhana koti 5 k watina wyapruthi 100 k magin janathawata setha sada thibe.me athara pa්radhana thanak ganne kahatagasdigiliye idiwana akkara 8 kin yuthu ki්radanganayayi.oonama ki්radawak kirimata awashya pahasukam laba dena me ki්rada pitiya sandaha kahatagasdigiliya pa්radeshiya sabhawa rupiyal laksha 50 k waya kara atha.ki්radanganaya samangama nawa pusthakalayak da dan kahatagasdigiliya pa්radeshaye idiwemin pawathi.
